pack.spin.version.hover_event: Click here to see changelog notes.
chat.spin.install.config.hover_event: Click here to open the config menu.
chat.spin.update: Spinjitzu! has been successfully updated. However, you may still run into issues that must be manually fixed.
chat.spin.update.successful: Any old items in your inventory have been updated
chat.spin.discord.hover_event: Click here to join my discord
chat.spin.wiki.hover_event: Click here to open the Spinjitzu! Wiki
chat.spin.gamerules.title: Spinjitzu! Gamerules
chat.spin.gamerules.doreloadmessage.desc: Toggle whether the datapack should announce once a reload is complete.
actionbar.spin.belt.no_power: You have not chosen a power yet
actionbar.spin.spinjitzu.cooldown: You are too exhausted to use Spinjitzu right now. Wait %s seconds
actionbar.spin.zen.close: A rush of peace ushers over you
actionbar.spin.zen.cant_enter: The space you are in is too cramped to meditate
actionbar.spin.zen.enter: You have entered the Zen state
actionbar.spin.zen.exit: You have exited the Zen state
item.spin.tornado.lore: Removal from the helmet slot will prematurely end Spinjitzu
item.spin.dragonbone_blade.lore: While wielding this weapon you become immune to the Elements
item.spin.sword_of_fire.lore: Increases your ability to control the element of Fire
item.spin.nunchucks_of_lightning.lore: Increases your ability to control the element of Lightning
item.spin.shurikens_of_ice.lore: Increases your ability to control the element of Ice
item.spin.scythe_of_quakes.lore: Increases your ability to control the element of Earth
item.spin.dragon_helmet.lore: While all 4 pieces of the armor are equipped you may control Firstbourne
item.spin.dragon_chestplate.lore: While all 4 pieces of the armor are equipped you may control Firstbourne
item.spin.dragon_leggings.lore: While all 4 pieces of the armor are equipped you may control Firstbourne
item.spin.dragon_boots.lore: While all 4 pieces of the armor are equipped you may control Firstbourne
item.spin.ninja_helmet.lore: Increases the strength of your Elemental abilities
item.spin.ninja_chestplate.lore: Increases the strength of your Elemental abilities
item.spin.ninja_leggings.lore: Increases the strength of your Elemental abilities
item.spin.ninja_boots.lore: Increases the strength of your Elemental abilities
meditation.spin.essence.golden_power.des: Elements of gold allow their users to create and manipulate energy and matter.
meditation.spin.essence.energy.desc: Elements of energy allow their users to create and manipulate energy.
meditation.spin.essence.creation.desc: Elements of creation allow their users to create and manipulate matter.
meditation.spin.essence.destruction.desc: Elements of destruction allow their users to destroy matter and energy.
meditation.spin.element.fire.desc: Fire allows the user to manipulate fire.
meditation.spin.element.lightning.desc: Lightning allows the user to control and manipulate lightning.
meditation.spin.element.earth.desc: Earth allows the user to manipulate the earth.
meditation.spin.element.ice.desc: Ice allows the user to manipulate ice.
meditation.spin.element.water.desc: Water allows the user to manipulate water.
meditation.spin.element.nature.desc: Nature allows the user to manipulate all that is living.
meditation.spin.element.time.desc: Time allows the user to manipulate the flow of time.
meditation.spin.element.wind.desc: Wind allows the user to manipulate the wind.
meditation.spin.element.form.desc: Form allows the user to manipulate their own shape and form.
meditation.spin.element.speed.desc: Speed allows the user to enhance their senses.
meditation.spin.power.blazing_trail.desc: You leave behind a trail of fire wherever you go.
meditation.spin.power.flame_punch.desc: Attacking enemies sets them on fire.
meditation.spin.power.frost_walker.desc: You create a trail of ice around you allowing you to walk on water.
meditation.spin.power.frost_punch.desc: Attacking enemies freezes them in a block of ice.
meditation.spin.power.earth_barrier.desc: Crouching for a short period of time raises the ground around you.
meditation.spin.power.earthen_punch.desc: Attacking enemies causes the ground beneath their feet to shatter.
meditation.spin.power.thunderstorm.desc: Entities around you are passively struck by lightning.
meditation.spin.power.lightning_punch.de: Attacking enemies strikes them with lightning.
meditation.spin.power.windy_punch.desc: Attacking enemies launches them into the air.
meditation.spin.power.pause.desc: Allows you to pause time around yourself for a short period
meditation.spin.power.slow-mo.desc: Allows you to slow down the time of one entity for a short period
meditation.spin.power.fast_forward.desc: Allows you to speed up the time in which you move for a short period
meditation.spin.power.reverse.desc: Allows you to move backwards in time by upwards of 5 seconds
